overview: The ins and outs of a married couple serve as the backdrop to bawdiness in this stirring opus. Ariel Knight plays the wanton wife of Randy Spears, but the flick opens with her in bed with lover Jon Martin. Ariel then wanders back to her own bed, only to dream up a fantasy romp with Nina Hartley and Denise Connors that sends the flick into true sexual orbit.
title: Portrait of a Nymph
